Literature.Title: De Novo Design of Antimicrobial Peptides With a Special Charge Pattern and Their Application in Combating Plant Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Chen EHL, Weng CW, Li YM, Wu MC, Yang CC, Lee KT, Chen RPY, Cheng CP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(IC50=10µg/ml),Xanthomonas euvesicatoria(IC50=4µg/ml),Xanthomonas campestris pv. campestris(IC50=4µg/ml),Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae(IC50=10µg/ml),Agrobacterium tumefaciens C58C1(IC50=10µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MBC=8µg/ml),Xanthomonas euvesicatoria(MIC=4µg/ml),Xanthomonas euvesicatoria(MBC=16µg/ml),Xanthomonas campestris pv. campestris(MIC=2µg/ml),Xanthomonas campestris pv. campestris(MBC=8µg/ml),Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae(MIC=4µg/ml),Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae(MBC=4µg/ml),Agrobacterium tumefaciens C58C1(MIC=4µg/ml),Agrobacterium tumefaciens C58C1(MBC=>32µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum(MIC=32µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum(MBC=>32µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000(MBC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae(MBC=>32µg/ml)
